document.full_text: plans for the first dam across the lower mekong river are putting laos on a collision course with its neighbors and environmentalists who fear livelihoods, fish species and farmland could be destroyed, potentially sparking a food crisis.
document.title: pressure mounts to delay "dangerous" $3.5 bln mekong river dam
lines_and_colors: plans for the first dam across the lower mekong river are putting laos on a collision course with its neighbors and environmentalists who fear livelihoods, fish species and farmland could be destroyed, potentially sparking a food crisis.
